original_text: As you looked, a stone was cut out by no human hand, and it struck the image on its feet of iron and clay, and broke them in pieces.
korean_text: 또 왕이 보신즉 손대지 아니한 돌이 나와서 신상의 쇠와 진흙의 발을 쳐서 부서뜨리매

sentences.original_text: a stone was cut out by no human hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람의 손으로 하지 않고 한 돌이 떨어져 나왔는데,

sentences.original_text: and it struck the image on its feet of iron and clay,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그 형상의 철과 진흙으로 된 발을 쳤고,
